name: spluttery
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Spluttery speech or sound is quick and confused, and full of short, unclear noises: He got all spluttery and angry, but you stayed completely calm. The dialogue is too spluttery, too stop-and-go.
More examplesFewer examplesThere was an eruption of hissing spluttery steam.You can just imagine the spluttery anger that such a decision would provoke.It's the kind of comedy that can make you laugh out loud and sob all at once in a spluttery mess. Camping used to be about bad food cooked over a spluttery gas burner.
